I—\""},{"lineNumber":56412,"originalJapaneseLine":"膝が、地面についた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Her knees touched the ground."},{"lineNumber":56413,"originalJapaneseLine":"アリオスの剣の軌道が、","translatedEnglishLine":"The trajectory of Arios’s sword,"},{"lineNumber":56414,"originalJapaneseLine":"躊躇なくセシルの頭を捉え――","translatedEnglishLine":"without hesitation, struck Cecil’s head—"},{"lineNumber":56415,"originalJapaneseLine":"「む、っ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mmm...\""},{"lineNumber":56416,"originalJapaneseLine":"「………………？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...........?\""},{"lineNumber":56417,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なぁにをしてやがる……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What the hell do you think you’re doing...\""},{"lineNumber":56418,"originalJapaneseLine":"「このアホ勇者が！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You idiot hero!\""},{"lineNumber":56419,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前は…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You are...\""},{"lineNumber":56420,"originalJapaneseLine":"「美人を殺そうなんてどこの愚か者かと思えば、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I thought you were some fool trying to kill a beautiful woman,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゆっくりと、口を開いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He slowly opened his mouth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……魔軍を、ずいぶんと止めているそうだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...It seems you've been holding back the demon army quite a bit."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 低い……低く、冷たい声だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was a low... low and cold voice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ……あ、ああ……約束しただろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah... ah, ah... you promised, didn't you?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この地を……自由都市を守ると」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To protect this land... the Free City."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いつか、君がまた、ここに来る、まで、と……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Until the day you return here again, and..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だから、私は…………！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's why I...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………迷惑な真似を、してくれる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...You sure know how to be a nuisance."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 信じられない言葉が、信じられない声色で響いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Unbelievable words echoed in an unbelievable tone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人類軍には戻るな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Don't return to the human army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さっさと……山奥にでも、ひきこもっていろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Quickly... hide away somewhere deep in the mountains."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ……アリ、オス……？　何を、言って…………」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A... Arios...? What are you saying..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「世界のためだ。…………理解する必要はない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's for the world. ...There's no need for you to understand."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんの感情も察する事もできないアリオスから……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From Arios, who showed no emotion or sympathy...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぞわりと、殺気が揺らめいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A chilling murderous intent flickered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……っ……で、できるわけがないだろう！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Th-There’s no way I can do that!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類が、滅ぶ……それに、君は、あの時――！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For humanity to perish... and you, at that time—!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「できないか。そうか。それなら――――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You can't? Is that so? In that case—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 混乱の極にあったセシルを、戦士の本能が救った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cecil, at the height of confusion, was saved by his warrior's instinct.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とっさに抜き放った愛剣が、アリオスの剣を止める。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: His beloved sword drawn on impulse stopped Arios's blade.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ、アリオス！？　何を……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, Arios!? What are you...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 君は、いったい…………！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What on earth are you...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 速く鋭い剣閃が、セシルを襲う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A fast and sharp slash attacked Cecil.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 防戦一方が幸いしたか、辛くもそれを受け止める。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Perhaps fortunate to be on the defensive, he barely managed to block it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ッ……どうしてだ、アリオス！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch... Why, Arios!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やめ、やめて、くれ……！　こんなッ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Stop, please stop...! This is...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アリオスとセシルの視線が交錯した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The eyes of Arios and Cecil met.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 感情のない……ただただ、目の前の障害を斬る、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Emotionless... simply cutting down the obstacle before him,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それ以外には、なんの興味もない瞳だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there was no interest in his eyes beyond that.
(Ah... this... is impossible...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 膝が、心が、折れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Her knees and heart broke.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘技術でも元より敵う事はなかっただろうが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She probably never stood a chance in combat skills to begin with, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それ以上に、そんな目には、耐えられなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: More than anything, she couldn’t bear those eyes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アリオスの剣に叩き落とされ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Struck down by Arios’s sword,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セシルの剣が地に刺さる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cecil’s sword plunged into the ground.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「アリ、オス……私は、君を――……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ari...os... I—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 膝が、地面についた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Her knees touched the ground.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アリオスの剣の軌道が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The trajectory of Arios’s sword,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 躊躇なくセシルの頭を捉え――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: without hesitation, struck Cecil’s head—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なぁにをしてやがる……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What the hell do you think you’re doing..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「このアホ勇者が！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You idiot hero!"
"You are..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「美人を殺そうなんてどこの愚か者かと思えば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I thought you were some fool trying to kill a beautiful woman,

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 躊躇なくセシルの頭を捉え――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: without hesitation, struck Cecil’s head—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なぁにをしてやがる……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What the hell do you think you’re doing..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「このアホ勇者が！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You idiot hero!"
"You are..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「美人を殺そうなんてどこの愚か者かと思えば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I thought you were some fool trying to kill a beautiful woman,
